title: 【112-2畢業體適能檢測調整公告】 Notice of on-line physical fitness test for Dong Hwa’s graduates of semester 112-2
author: 邱健榮
content:
分類： 行政公告, 其他公告
來源： 體育中心 - 邱健榮 - janus@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6613
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生_休學學生_兼任教師
標題： 【112-2畢業體適能檢測調整公告】 Notice of on-line physical fitness test for Dong Hwa’s graduates of semester 112-2
日期： Mon, 22 Apr 2024 13:47:16 +0800

為因應本校大學部授課方式以線上教學為原則，本學期暫停實體的體適能檢測。惟本學期擬畢業但尚未通過體適能檢測同學，提供東華E學苑 (NEW) 線上檢測方式，請有意參加線上體適能檢測同學，登入東華e學苑網頁，如下：
https://elearn4.ndhu.edu.tw/moodle/login/index.php

課名：112學年擬畢業生線上體適能測驗
請先觀賞課程影片後，再進入到「線上體適能測驗」，測驗題目為99題選擇題，不限時間作答，得分70分(含)以上視為通過測驗
本項體適能線上測驗僅限本學期 (112-2) 擬畢業且尚未通過檢測同學參加
測驗時間：4月23日起至5月13日止
成績登錄：5月24日

In response to the severe 0403 earthquake event, we decide to cancel the in-person physical fitness test and provide an alternative on-line physical fitness test on Dong Hwa E-learning (NEW) platform exclusively for graduates of semester 112-2, who have yet to pass the aforementioned test to be qualified for graduation.

Please log on to E-learning website as follows:
https://elearn4.ndhu.edu.tw/moodle/login/index.php

Course name: on-line physical fitness test for graduates of 112-2 semester

After having viewed the film, please pick the correct answer from each of 99 multiple choice questions. Those who score 70 grades are deemed to pass the exam.

This on-line physical fitness test is exclusively designed for graduates of 112-2 semester, who have yet to pass the exam for graduation.

Effective date: Apr. 23 (Tues) up to May. 13 (Mon), 2024
Grade submission date: May. 24 (Fri), 2024
